attributes.action: Jail the leaders of these race related marches.
attributes.background: I for one want the Government to stop the walks against religions that seem to be sweeping the country.

rejection.details:
If you believe that you have evidence that someone has broken the law, you should report that to the police.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, you could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
